definition: foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam

sentences.english: Add tomato puree, salt and 1 cup water; bring to a boil.
sentences.chinese: 加入番茄醬，鹽與1杯水，煮至沸騰。

sentences.english: Parma ham, fresh mozzarella, arugula salad filling with tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 巴馬火腿，馬蘇裏拉，芝麻草和番茄醬。

sentences.english: ADD salt and tomato paste halfway through the cooking, or later.
sentences.chinese: 在烹飪過程加適量的鹽或番茄醬或者稍後加。

sentences.english: We offer high quality of Tomato Paste in aseptic and non aseptic packings .
sentences.chinese: 我們提供優質番茄醬，採用無菌包裝和非無菌包裝。

sentences.english: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, beef tenderloin, Italian sausage.
sentences.chinese: 番茄醬，馬蘇裏拉，牛肉，意大利香腸。

sentences.english: I use a special dressing and homemade catsup.
sentences.chinese: 我用了特別的佐料和自制的番茄醬。

sentences.english: After both sides are fried to a golden brown, add tomato sauce and Parmesan cheese.
sentences.chinese: 茄子兩面都變成焦黃色之後，加入番茄醬和巴馬乾酪。

sentences.english: If you're in the mood for pasta, look for tomato-based sauces rather than cream-based sauces.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想喫意大利麪食，不要點奶油醬，點番茄醬吧。

sentences.english: Pastas, sauces and flavorful cheeses are at the heart of real Italian food.
sentences.chinese: 番茄醬意大利粉被認爲是意大利菜。

sentences.english: We don't want the tomato to turn to any mushes or tomato sauce.
sentences.chinese: 我們不希望番茄炒碎或者變成番茄醬。

sentences.english: B, They all come with mustard and ketchup .
sentences.chinese: 漢堡都加了芥末和番茄醬。

sentences.english: Shrimp, chilies, tomato sauce, arugula salad.
sentences.chinese: 蝦，辣椒粉，番茄醬，芝麻草。

sentences.english: The white vinegar, tomato paste, sugar, salt, pepper transferred into the juice.
sentences.chinese: 將白醋，番茄醬，糖，鹽，胡椒粉調成汁。

sentences.english: Finally, add some tomato sauce and grated cheese on top.
sentences.chinese: 最後，在扇面加上一些番茄醬和磨碎的奶酪。

sentences.english: A woman was trying hard to get the catsup to come out of the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 一個婦人正在使勁打開番茄醬的瓶子來。

sentences.english: Mushroom, Mung bean, tomato souse with onions and herbs .
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇，綠豆，番茄醬，洋蔥和大蔥。

definition: thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
to work extra hours/to do overtime
